content: Worst experience, this app interface isn't user friendly.
it's not good

On a 'cash on delivery', a guy from their office called on WhatsApp, pretending to be a rider, asked for an advance in his personal Bkash account, and then started talking garbage.
terrible app. Not a single restaurant is open inside the app. meanwhile other food delivery apps said they are open.
fraud
it asked for otp to login, I added my number but I never receive any otp. I tried two times and then it keeps showing something went error!
Very bad
The rider asked me for money in advance in his personal bkash account. what type of delivery app is this. either don take cash on delivery orders or stop this nonsense. Complete garbage of an app
no customer care service.Delay delivery, i payment advance but cannot get same amount food.Very horrible.

This app is a total scam. They will consume 50-80 minutes to deliver a food. Service is really poor. They have a fixed delivery man for a region. The delivery man collects food from a lot of restaurants and deliver to multiple customers and so the food is super delayed. Their management also does not take any action on any complaints. They are so unprofessional.
can't even log in this trash app
Order delivers at late. I had to wait almost 1 hour more than the time it had mentioned.
Takes too much time to deliver the food
not recommended, very poor service.
so bad üëé
Even after trying for several times I still haven't get any OTP so that I can log in
your cart sometimes says empty I miss out on a lot of offers because of it please fix it asap.
The worst food app ever.
worst app ever. Riders are worst. do not deliver food on time. Just worst. I do not recommend anyone to order food from here.
Used to be good. Now they cancel orders without notifying, even from restaurants that are within walking distance
it takes literally 2 hours to deliver any kind of food and there is no option to check rider's location
Worst food app and discount policy in Bangladesh.. Trying 10 times for OTP...No Reply... Discount policy is a scam.. Other new apps are doing far better job in this sector..Don't download this app..

This app is so bad I ordered something and I paid early with my card but nvr received my food I clearly paid but they told me I haven't paid yet it took my money and nvr gave me my food if I could I would rated it in minus
Very much Delay. I ordered multiple times & each time they completed the delivery after e long time. Their riders do not pay attention to anything. They do not take any suggestions. Rubbish service.

Worst Delivery service ever..I ordered, Also did advanced payment then waited for 1 .5 hour....it showed my order is prepared and after 1 hour they cancelled it... Don't order using this scam app..Poor service
One of the worst services i have experienced. They show bill before order, but the bill changes after confirming the order. Also don't have the option to cancel the order.
Very bad service. Delivered food too much late.
Worst experience ever. Never gonna order from them again ü§¨

One of the most bad app I ever install in my phone this app didn't support COD,bikash or card when other app provide all of this feature

They took the order from the app then called from phone and said they cannot deliver. Why did I waste my time on this even! Moreover they have online payments. Wow never ordering again
Very slow. Popular restaurants not available.

Literally bad. I've ordered a meal and 15 minutes gone- no update or something on the order if it's accepted or not. They don't have any cancel option either. I had to manually call the call center and cancel the order. Bad service.
Worst service ever.Dont order anything from here.
Worst experience ever.
Don't have coverage in Bashundara area still the ads are coming everywhere and they showing the ads with location. After signing up they saying my area is not under coverage. Disappointing.

As soon as you enter this app, it asks for location access. Even after giving that access, you have to manually select the location while confirming the order. Though we have to manually select the location, why does it want location access at the beginning? It's a very suspicious matter.
Waiting for almost 1 and half hours for the food. Absolutely ridiculous!!!!

This is so much irritating when a notification comes and it's vibrate! Please remove this vibrate option or give a setting option where user can manually choose that they want this vibrate option or not!!

Then after around 40 mins I get my order. All these and a 50 tk service charge Not recommended Foodpanda is better
Horrible experience

So bad

Never come to any use, totally a useless scattered app.

I placed my order before lunch, but no rider picked it up. About two hours later, a rider was assigned. I called him around 10 times, but he didn't answer. In the evening, around four hours later, the rider canceled, citing "Customer wants to cancel" as the reason. Meanwhile, I tried to contact customer care, but they showed no remorse, stating that the delay was expected due to rush hour.
Distance is less than a kilometre but they can't deliver ü§£ü§£

Fake marketing... Totally useless. Only GUI is good.
Worst food delivery app I ever used. Delivery man called me 2.5 hours later to deliver my parcel.

worst food delivery app ever. Don't ever use it.I said Just don't

I still prefer Foodpanda cause they are better with their service even though they offer relatively less discounts. Leaving this app, and never coming back again
I don't find any good restaurant in this app like bfc, they need to improve a lot
Cheap and fake marketing... Never gonna install the app

Totally Bad Experience, App Not Working and I think it's a fraud company
It's fake app. Don‚Äôt use it. A scam to hijack money. Be careful. Contact no is also fake.

Absolutely horrible application. The cart doesn't load regardless of what I order. It cannot pinpoint my location correctly either. I eventually deleted the cache and data, so I can start from the beginning again. Upon restarting the application, it failed to verify my number - thus locking me out of the app. Here's an advice, if you've disconnected the backend server, kindly notify the customers. Save our time! Undoubtedly the worst delivery service application I've stumbled upon.
Couldn‚Äôt even sign up.
Very bad, when you can't deliver, then why you show those restaurants?? Very disappointed service
Lot of bugs. Server is to much slow. I can not even see anything or any restaurant.

Just another food delivery service trying to make a quick buck.

Very worst...

worst

true example of a worst app... Their vouchers doesn't work in any restaurants.Literally one of the worst food delivery app I ever used.

Actually I think they cheat indirectly to customer.2 days ago,my friend ordered some food by it.they delivered food with high discount.discount encourages people to make order and save money.but due to discount,they intentionally downgrade food quality.Likewise,in pabulum BBQ Burger,i got a little amount patty which can be compared to a burger with no patty.sauce was given too much with slight amount of cheese.where food panda did struggle to give discount in crisis,how khaodao could give it??
